name: Relaxing on The Quiet Beautiful Beach!
description: Bira and Bara beach are located at the most southern tip of South Sulawesi’s peninsula, 195 kilometers south of Ujung Pandang/ Makassar. You can walk on the secluded white sandy beach, crystal clear calm water, see the underwater garden, and  unique maritime culture because it's the place where they make the traditional Phinisi.
